subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: A cross from Hulk deflected in off defender Sasa Papac in the first minute of injury time, giving Brazil a 2-1 victory over Bosnia-Herzegovina in an exhibition Tuesday in St. Gallen, Switzerland.
snippet: A cross from Hulk deflected in off defender Sasa Papac in the first minute of injury time, giving Brazil a 2-1 victory over Bosnia-Herzegovina in an exhibition Tuesday in St. Gallen, Switzerland.
